tags.name: Custom phrases
tags.description:
Endpoints for managing custom phrases that allow you to customize the phrases displayed in the sign-in experience.

See [Localized language](https://docs.logto.io/docs/recipes/customize-sie/localized-language/) to learn more about custom phrases for localization.

get.summary: Get custom phrases by language tag
get.description: Get custom phrases for the specified language tag.

200.description: Custom phrases for the specified language tag.

404.description: Custom phrases not found for the specified language tag.

put.summary: Upsert custom phrases by language tag

delete.summary: Delete custom phrases by language tag
